decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with cards like Ancient Tomb and Lotus Petal, while using creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Seasoned Dungeoneer to apply early pressure on the opponent. With the ability to play powerful spells like Chalice of the Void and Fury for free thanks to cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide, this deck aims to dominate the board and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. By utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck focuses on securing victories through early game tempo advantage.

This Legacy combo deck focuses on generating mana quickly and efficiently to cast a large number of spells in a single turn, ultimately leading to a win condition like Tendrils of Agony. It utilizes cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal to accelerate mana production, while also incorporating draw spells like Brainstorm and Echo of Eons to maintain card advantage. Burning Wish allows for additional flexibility in accessing key combo pieces from the sideboard when needed. The deck aims to cycle through its library rapidly and assemble the necessary pieces to win the game in a single explosive turn.

The main concept of this Grixis Aggro deck is to exert early pressure on the opponent with efficient and disruptive creatures like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with countermagic like Daze, Force of Will, and Spell Pierce. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Molten Collapse, as well as disrupt the opponent's mana base with Wasteland. The deck's strategy is to quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize and take control.

The main concept of this deck is to control the opponent's resources and tempo through a combination of cards like Stifle, Swords to Plowshares, and Dress Down, while utilizing cards like Phyrexian Dreadnought and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to create advantage and outvalue the opponent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly building up its own threats and maintaining control of the board with a mix of removal, countermagic, and card advantage engines.

The deck focuses on using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill your library quickly, then using Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle and win the game instantly. It also utilizes cards like Force of Will and Teferi, Time Raveler to protect the combo and disrupt opponents. The deck includes multiple ways to search for combo pieces, as well as interaction with cards like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending for removal. The strategy revolves around assembling the combo pieces quickly and efficiently to close out the game before the opponent can respond.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying a horde of goblins onto the battlefield using cards like Goblin Lackey and Aether Vial. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Searslicer Goblin, while also gaining card advantage with Goblin Matron and Goblin Ringleader. With powerful finishers like Muxus, Goblin Grandee and Sling-Gang Lieutenant, the deck aims to deal fast and consistent damage to the opponent, utilizing synergy between goblins and tribal support cards like Cavern of Souls. Additionally, cards like Wasteland and Munitions Expert help control the opponent's board.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively cast spells with Cascade to cheat out big threats like Crashing Footfalls. Utilizing cards like Violent Outburst and Shardless Agent to cascade into powerful spells, along with disruption from Force of Will and Force of Negation, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The use of mana acceleration from cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide allows for explosive plays, while also utilizing tempo plays with Brazen Borrower and removal spells like Fire / Ice. Overall, the strategy is to push out threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan efficiently.
